name: Empty Dungeon
description:
Build your own dungeon path with only one tile at a time in the Empty Dungeon! And get to the next area strategically with your limited amount of tiles!

Empty Dungeon is my entry for GMTK Game Jam 2019 made within 48 hours with the theme "only one".

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click - Place Tile / Move to next screen
  • Enter - Move to next screen
  • ESC - Quit the game

Download:

  • Window version includes both 32 and 64 bits
  • Love version can be run using LÖVE version 10.2 on Windows, Mac and Linux.

Credit:

  • Fonts: by mattWalkden
  • Graphics: Me &  Ansimuz
  • Library: Hump by vrld, Knife by airstruck, Push by Ulydev ,StateMachine by Colton Ogden
  • Sounds: Me & Out of my dreams NES by Snabisch
  • Code & Design: Me
